name: Abdul Rahman Al-Saqlawi
description: Founding member (2013). LLB Ajman University (2007). Board member – Center for International Relations (Kuwaiti Bar) 2019. Chairman – Social Committee (Kuwaiti Lawyers Association) 2017. Dubai Judicial Institute Practical Training (60h, 2012). Specialist in AML/CFT Law 2015. Certified International Arbitrator (Commercial) Geneva 2011.

name: Saleh Al-Saqlawi
description: Partner member. LLB University of Sharjah 2015. Master researcher in Public Law (UAE – Sharjah Univ 2019). Specialization in administrative cases (cancellation/compensation/contracts/execution). Practical training for federal courts & prosecutions (UAE 2019).

name: Iman Abdul Rahman Al-Hashash
description: Member of Rekaz. Lawyer in Constitutional & Cassation Court. LLB Ajman University 2014. Specializes in Personal Status, Administrative Law, Medical Liability. Former legal researcher at Ministry of Interior.

name: Abdullah Ali Al-Meaaan
description: Former legal researcher – Ministry of Defense. Member – Kuwaiti Jurists Association. Legal trainer preparation course. AML course (Law 106/2013). Bankruptcy law course – Judicial Training Institute (UAE). Course on Union Law No.10/2019 (judicial relations).
